thread.title: BRIEF-Bittium receives a purchase order from Finnish Defence Forces
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Bittium receives a purchase order from Finnish Defence Forces | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Bittium receives a purchase order from Finnish Defence Forces
text:
Oct 14 Bittium Oyj :
* Received a purchase order from Finnish Defence Forces for further development of waveform of software-defined radio based Bittium TAC WIN system
* Value of received purchase order is 2.0 million euros ($2.3 million) excluding VAT
* Now ordered work package will be delivered to Finnish defence forces during first half of year 2016
Source text: bit.ly/1NGXfP4
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8748 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
